resources.string: This will send a text message to your registered contacts that you added them as your emergency contacts
I added you as my emergency contact.You\'ll receive a message with my location info in case I\'m in danger
This will send a message that you are secure now

WOSA is a woman safety android application developed for protecting lives of people in any emergency situations. In case of unsafe situation,just TAP the PANIC button to raise a emergency alert to the trusted contacts saved in the application. This alert will be in the form of SMS informing that you are unsafe and need help.The SMS includes accurate current GPS location with address of the user along with google maps link and recorded audio link.The trusted contacts can use this google maps link to get directions and navigate to the exact location of the distressed person.
